apple_vendor_description: The kiss: person, person emoji on Apple devices depicts two figures leaning in for a tender embrace, rendered with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and realistic lighting. Their medium-dark skin tones are depicted with smooth gradients, conveying warmth and a loving connection that feels particularly genuine on Apple devices. This emoji on Apple devices beautifully captures a moment of shared affection and romantic intimacy, perfect for expressing deep feelings in your digital communications.
